火神山医院开始浇灌首块地坪！临时房已吊放旁边

26日，位于武汉市蔡甸区知音湖大道的武汉火神山医院的建设现场，千余名建筑工人鏖战正酣。据了解，火神山医院预计床位700-1000张，2月2日可整体移交军方管理。
在现场，几十台挖掘机、推土机、渣土车密集施工，与此同时，前期施工好的一块平地上，施工人员正在铺设地坪。几十个浇灌的临时房已经吊放在旁边，随时准备拼成医用房区。

Wuhan Huoshenshan Hospital construction has entered its fourth day. Following the model of Xiaotangshan Hospital in Beijing during the fight against SARS in 2003, Huoshenshan Hospital is designed to have an area of 25,000 square meters and will provide 700 to 1,000 beds, according to local authorities.

Huoshenshan Hospital will be put into use by February 2 and will be managed by the Chinese military. Leishenshan Hospital, Wuhan's other specialized hospital, will hold 1,300 beds and is expected to be put into use by February 5. #coronavirus
